issue.title: [Rust] Schema/Field/Datatype should implement serde traits
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3855](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3855). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
JSON serde is already implemented but in a non-standard way which prevents referencing Arrow types from structs that implement the serde Serialization/Deserialization traits.

We should refactor this code so that the Arrow types implement custom serialization. See <https://serde.rs/custom-serialization.html> for more information.
